data.title: The Carolyn Jackson Collection, no. 27
data.meta_description: Austin television personality Carolyn Jackson interviews actress Susan Saint James about the film Outlaw Blues, in which she plays a woman helping an ex-convict get revenge on the man who stole his song. Saint James, who at the time of the interview was best known for her role in the television program McMillan & Wife, reflects that she enjoyed getting to expand her acting experience. Outlaw Blues was filmed entirely in Austin and Saint James praises the city and its welcoming, family-friendly atmosphere. She also discusses family life, living in an Airstream trailer, her family's pets, and their vegetarian diet.
data.meta_site_name: The Film and Video Archive of Texas
